recommendations: Nathalie Perez
UX Designer | Strategy | Digital and Physical Visual Design
July 4, 2017, Jill was senior to Nathalie but didn’t manage directly

I’m fortunate to have attended a few of Jill’s UX talks were she shares her valuable knowledge and insight in the field. She’s so approachable that I asked her for advice for advancing my UX career.She had very on point suggestions, instinctively  offering guidance and showing me connecting points between my interests and my possibilities. She went in deep, dedicated me a lot of her time and guided me to see in which fields I can add value according to my strengths.She’s so wonderful!THANK YOU JILL.

Rio Penabella
Strategist. Planner. Design Thinker.
June 15, 2017, Rio was a client of Jill’s

Jill has been an amazing UX mentor and resource in the short time I have known her. Her guidance and knowledge in UX and the industry has been extremely valuable.I first met Jill as my instructor for the General Assembly's UX Design Bootcamp I took. It was great! The entire class was engage, everybody enjoyed the material and each exercise. I particularly enjoyed a lot of the prototyping we did, and presenting our MVP to the group. The bootcamp was such an inspiration, I was reached out to Jill on some thoughts towards a trajectory towards a position in UX Design. In short, Jill was great. She took time out of her week, provided some insight and knowledge that I have used to recalibrate my career. I can’t wait to participate in more industry events, and hopefully support one of her projects in the future in a professional capacity.

If you need help taking your business to the next level, Jill's your gal.  She's super clear and insightful and gives practical actionable tips.  She doesn't complicate the process and she's a really good listener.  She's also a super cool person!  I highly recommend Jill if you need help;  redesigning your website, improving your social media presence or mapping out a plan for world domination!

Jill is such a great instructor and mentor! She not only gave me advice on my career, such as tips for job searching and LinkedIn profile, but also encouraged me to be a strong female professional. I felt very lucky that I took her UX design class at GA.

Jaynesis Ong
Promoting Systemic Impact through User-Centered Strategy
February 16, 2017, Jaynesis reported directly to Jill

Empathy is the obvious resonance you could distinguish from speaking and meeting with Jill. She offers an abundance of positive energy, but most importantly she is patient and insightful. Through her patience, she is able to grow people the way gardeners are careful and patient with growing plants. Through her insight she is able to expand on her patience for those who are difficult, calm the nerves who are confused or upset, and dissect problems in process that stall the progress of others. She is consistent and clear with her instruction as she is charming and endearing with her leadership. Jill is the archetype in which I model my drive to advocate for the UX process and having integrity with all my future ventures as a professional.

Product Designer at Digital Karma, LLC
July 6, 2017, Jill managed Elizé directly

I am a huge fan of Elize’s understanding and implementation of design thinking. She is great with strategy, team building, research and is quick on her feet. She takes the time to understand business and user goals in order to apply her knowledge and create meaningful products. She also has the best sense of humor and her energy is contagious! She would be a major asset to any design firm.

Lisandra Maioli - User Experience
UX Research | UX Design | Digital Communications
March 6, 2017, Jill was Lisandra Maioli’s teacher

Lisandra is truly one of the best UX Researchers that I have ever worked with. She goes above and beyond in her research and makes sure that every feature and function in her projects is based on solid user research. She has no fear of contextual inquiry and will get out "into the wild" and observe people to understand their needs more clearly. She uncovers many solutions in her research processes that would often go unnoticed in a typical project. She is objective in her work and aware of any possible biases. Her journalism background and her gentle, attentive candor makes her a great interviewer of target demographics. She is a great collaborator and critical thinker and a true delight to work with. I would work with her again in a heartbeat.

summary: Jill is a Global Educator, Trainer, Mentor, Speaker and Consultant. Jill and her team at Digital Karma work diligently to:- Launch successful digital products and solutions for their clients- Improve existing digital products- Boost the skills of corporate teams via custom UX training sessions and the community via workshops and events. In addition to being the Head of Product Design and CEO of Digital Karma, Jill also serves as an IxD Advisory Board Member for Santa Monica College. For over two years, Jill served as a Lead UXDI Instructor + Global Education Strategy Team Member at GA. Jill began programming when she was 8 years old and has been designing digital products for over 17 years. Jill is an entrepreneur and thrives on creative collaboration and solving design challenges. She loves coming up with simple, effective solutions that provide the best possible user experience. Jill believes strongly in sound workflow practices and development methods to create the best project possible right out of the gate. She has experienced firsthand the great benefits of agile development and it is her preferred development workflow. She has worked with several brands such as Fox, Buick, Walgreen’s and Digitas to design and develop 2nd screen interactions. Jill’s specialties are: Corporate Education and Training, MVP Consulting, Lean Strategies, Mentorship, Public Speaking, Education, Product Design, Guiding Startups, and Entrepreneurs, Team Management, Heuristic Evaluations, Contextual Inquiry, User Experience Design, User-centered Design, User Interface Design, Customer Experience, User Research, Personas, User Scenarios, User Flows, Information Architecture, Sitemaps, Wireframes, Usability Testing, Interactive Prototyping, UX Strategy, VR (Virtual Reality Consulting), Gamification, SEO, Mobile UX, A/B Testing, Metrics & Analytics, and Strategy.
name: Jill DaSilva
title: Working with global teams to create successful, user-centered experiences | Enterprise UX Trainer | Consultant | Entrepreneur | Mentor
